titleStmt.title: Parthenia, or The mayden-head of the first musicke that ever vvas printed for the virginalls. Composed by three famous masters: William Byrd, Dr: John Bull, & Orlando Gibbons, gentlemen of his Majesties chappell. Dedicated to all the masters and lovers of musick
titleStmt.author: Byrd, William, 1542 or 3-1623.
Bull, John, d. 1628. aut
Gibbons, Orlando, 1583-1625. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Clarke, at the lower end of Cheapside, entring [sic] into Mercers Chappell,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum Privilegio.
Except for letterpress title page, engraved throughout.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the lower end of Cheapside, entring [sic] into Mercers Chappell
